definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I hope he can see the movie next time.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他下回能看这部影片。

sentences.english: A compound slide with tool post sits between them.
sentences.chinese: 复合投影片与工具后坐在他们之间。

sentences.english: In this movie we often pay attention to a vocabulary of "institutionalized".
sentences.chinese: 在这个影片里我经常注意的一个词“体制化”。

sentences.english: The budget will depend on the script, what kind of financing the producer can get, and also who is cast in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 预算取决于剧本，获得的投资以及影片的演员阵容。

sentences.english: How to relieve symptoms of hemorrhoids in this free home health video series.
sentences.chinese: 如何缓解这个免费的家庭健康系列影片痔疮的症状。

sentences.english: The American public has yet to see the Zapruder film.
sentences.chinese: 美国民众还没有看到撒氏拍摄的影片。

sentences.english: There are many meaningful long scenes in this director's films.
sentences.chinese: 这位导演的影片中有很多意味深长的长镜头。

sentences.english: Another major investor in the movie is a company in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 影片的另一个主要投资人是浙江的一家公司。

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the 57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片获第57届柏林电影节最佳影片金熊奖。

sentences.english: Google's natural impulse is to unleash its algorithms on this video content in order to search it.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌的本能是在影片内容上挥洒其演算法以利搜寻。

sentences.english: As for the film itself, I can simply report that it isn't too bad at all.
sentences.chinese: 至于影片本身，我只能说，还不算糟糕透顶。

sentences.english: I can provide additional animation layers and videos to have this done.
sentences.chinese: 我可以提供额外的层和动画影片有此完成。

sentences.english: The film flashed forward to show us the result of her decision.
sentences.chinese: 影片提前向我们叙述了她的决定所产生的结果。

sentences.english: The movie Titanic is recording good in Guangming Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 影片《铁达尼号》在光明影片院十分卖座。

sentences.english: The movie Titanic is recording good in Guangming Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 影片《铁达尼号》在光明影片院十分卖座。

sentences.english: At my house we watched a few DVD.
sentences.chinese: 在我家里，我们看了一些DVD影片。
